text: Antonina Mykhailivna Kravchuk (; November 3, 1935) is a Ukrainian socialite. She was the First Lady of Ukraine from 1991 until 1994. She was married to Leonid Kravchuk from 1957 until his death in 2022.First ladies of Ukraine , ITAR-TASS (6 June 2014). ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Ukraine Category:Socialites
title: Antonina Kravchuk
